title: Gentle Reminder for URF Players
body: Don't forget to **have a good time** because it's a temporary gamemode! There is no time to stress out about whats OP, what are you doing on the boards?! Go make crazy plays with your friends immediately! The balance of the game can wait for another day!

replies.body:
{{champion:29}}  Let's have fun, play whatever we want to play, experiment in UR-

{{champion:37}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:76}}  NO

I had the time of my life yesterday playing {{champion:20}} , got a tripple with 3 distinct snowballs down in middle lane. {{champion:114}} is crazy fun, {{champion:54}} is utterly broken. Just build him full AP with just sunfire cape, enjoy /all chat filled with "how did you even manage to feed Malphite?!" 
{{champion:14}} , oh my dear {{champion:14}} . Scream minions to the enemies all game long, while permanently shielded with W running around the map with your 20 second R, giving 9 people a headache from the thunderous **DUUUUN** he does when he beggins his R.

Twitch is very strong in URF...

> [{quoted}](name=Anyael,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7U6EGi65,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-04-02T01:40:04.866+0000)
>
> Twitch is very strong in URF...

My point was that Twitch is an uncommon pick and something you'd play to test out, probably, and the others are pick or ban

also twitch may be strong, but not so much with zed/riven/leblanc on the enemy team oneshotting him.
twitch is stupidly strong in urf 2 second Es, 2 second W's, 2 Q's 20 second ultimate..... i literally 1 v 4 the enemy team a couple of matches ago

He/she's just saying in general , say you wanted to try something off meta such as ad nunu,aatrox,maybe olaf or something, you try laning with the usual leblanc/zed/sona/riven/katarina urf main and your going to cryâ€¦.. I get your supposed to try to win in urf but everyone picks the same thing over and over xD i rarely see anyone experiment because they're too scared

> [{quoted}](name=RavenKouhai,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7U6EGi65,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-04-02T02:14:43.385+0000)

> also twitch may be strong, but not so much with zed/riven/leblanc on the enemy team oneshotting him.

Not to be rude but you're wrong, easy to beat at least Zed and LeBlanc as Twitch.

> [{quoted}](name=Anyael,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7U6EGi65,comment-id=0004000000000001,timestamp=2015-04-02T03:49:35.666+0000)
>
> Not to be rude but you're wrong, easy to beat at least Zed and LeBlanc as Twitch.

Ok. I literally just picked a random champion. 

Regardless of champion strength, my point still stands that Twitch is a more experimental urf pick (that not many people are playing) than leblanc/zed/nidalee/riven/sona/etcetcetc which are seen quite frequently and considered the best urf picks
Twitch is amazingly fun in urf mode. Stealth assassin and constant expunge.

URF would be fun...

If the enemy team didn't choose a team comp that was the output of an anti-fun equation. Every. Single Time.
Zed hec nid sona ezreal, every game without fail.  Kat le blanc morg lux  malz if not.  If you play for fun you play to lose

> [{quoted}](name=Thefriendlyorc,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7U6EGi65,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-04-02T16:09:26.443+0000)
>
> Zed hec nid sona ezreal, every game without fail.  Kat le blanc morg lux  malz if not.  If you play for fun you play to lose

^ this

I played yorick against ahri,  hecarim, ezreal, I literally could never catch them, if I left my base, I'd never get away. They do way too much and my ghouls make no difference.  Ahri didn't even have to land skill shots

If you want a good time, play Syndra.

I couldn't stop giggling for the first ten minutes.
lol just duod with my brother and he played her while i went vel.  ultimate barrage of balls.
Ahem.
yes, the phrasing was not lost to me lol
LOL
If you love tanking play Galio.  Max shield and prepare to have the time of your life.
YES OH MY GOSH.  last year he was better when healing wasn't reduced and everybody just played ap poke champs.  I lost exactly 1 game because we had 2 afk...and we still got all the way to inhibs

Karthus is pure murder-machine madness....

And I saw a *Sona Pentakill*  today

I see why so many people clamored for this back. Bloody brilliantly insane.
karth is actually kinda weird to play as. The delay on his Q is longer than the cd! and with the movespeed everyone has, it's hard to land it well unless yer already dead XD
Also, Soraka's ult in URF eliminates Karthus', if timed right:D
uh, you are aware that healing is reduced by a fair chunk, right?
{{champion:30}} yeah he's OP in URF. The 40 sec CD ult tho...
I played Attack Speed Bard, and let me tell you, I regret nothing
I went Sion, and defended a tower by screaming EVERY minion away repeatedly.

That sounds hilarious!

Thinking of taking it into normals?

I built a Wit's End on Twisted Fate, and I'm . . . tempted. Only problem is, there's not really a place for it.
Attack speed TF is scary as hell

Upvoted for your attitude.

Unfortunately, there's *always* people that take shit too seriously. Lost to a Sona+Hec from enemy team? Who cares... everyone's gotta be OP here and there in URF.
URF ARAM let's go XD

> [{quoted}](name=Champion Skin,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7U6EGi65,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-02T00:25:39.859+0000)
>

*PLEASE*
That might actually be REALLY epic. If Nemesis taught us something, it's that very few champions are really useless.
played it in customs, it is so scary and takes forever to even get the first tower XD
Getting rolfstomped isnt fun

Hah.. Playing lots of ARAMs prepared me for dodging nida/zed poke 24/7 with closed eyes and hand in my..

Also thanks to ARAM i got used to fighting against pretty much the same teams..

Well.. Damn

itd be cool if every champ was viable but when youre constantly against zed, ez, xerath, nidalee, sona etc and im here trying to have fun with AP nasus, it gets frustrating. If you deviate outside the OP champs, youre most likely going to get it in the butt
What If you dont have any friends :<......

> [{quoted}](name=Philoshopher,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7U6EGi65,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-04-02T04:26:18.042+0000)
>
> What If you dont have any friends :<......

If you don't have any friends you can always add me :) I'd love to play with you
wukong and shaco hilarious
PLayed azir. The funniest shit I have ever seen!

I understand some people's frustration when most of the community just wanted to play urf to abuse an easy win because they struggle other wise ( reason why i personally don't like urf, too much cheese ) however cheers for those trying to have fun with different champions (: I really wish One for All would make a comeback. It was the most hilarious and fun mode from the odd ones.

I don't think that is why they play urf. Stop judging people motives. LOL is 47% Bronze-Silver with a 50-50 chance of winning. Most people are just normal. The only actually "TRYHARDS" are gold and above. Think how much you have to play to get into the top 25% of 27 million players. NOW THEY ARE SERIOUS! Other people just don't like to lose.
Except some of us have the unfortunate situation of fighting golds, plats and diamonds on a regular basis, and they do indeed try hard as fuck.
I would expect them to. Who makes it past gold dicking around? If they weren't trying they would be playing normals. And that contradictsa what you said in the beginning.

Speaking of urf mode. Some need to realize when to switch off. Ranked try hards is fine,  that's the point of it.

Edit: also I think you have me confused with the first person commenting. In any case, try harding has its place, but it shouldn't be in modes designed for fun.

Play {{champion:6}} .

Thank me later.

Azir may just be the strongest early game lane bully.

Turns a 1v1 into a 10v1 with all of his soldiers.
Yeah he is an asshole
{{champion:34}}  has a permanant ulti. and wall spam. and 1 sec E cooldown. that was the most fun i've had in a while.
